data.name: THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98 ULTIMATE MATCH FINAL EDITION Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98 ULTIMATE MATCH FINAL EDITION ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK features songs from KOF' 98 on the NEOGEO as well as ones added in KOF '98 ULTIMATE MATCH resulting in a massive 63 track OST!
The SNK Sound Team have newly remastered each track for your listening enjoyment.

The sound track comes in 2 file formats, MP3 and FLAC.

This is a DLC for THE KING OF FIGHTERS' 98 ULTIMATE MATCH FINAL EDITION and so it is not featured in the base game.
